text: Gianni Cavina (9 December 1940 â€“ 26 March 2022) was an Italian actor. He appeared in more than 45 movies since 1949. His best known roles were in The House with Laughing Windows, House of Pleasure for Women and Christmas Present. Cavina died in Bologna, Italy on 26 March 2022, at the age of 81. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Italian movie actors Category:Italian stage actors Category:Italian television actors Category:People from Bologna
title: Gianni Cavina
